TopicTitle: What KSP Component Do I add In Unity 5?

Articles.Content:
I created mods for Unity 4 and KSP.   After importing PartTools 0.23, I would add a Component to the GameObject.

The new KSP 1.1.2 PartTools package does not have a component to add as it did in PartTools 0.23

So, given that I imported the PartTools 1.1.2 unity package, what component (or whatever) do I need to add to my GameObject?

5 hours ago, Apollo13 said:

I created mods for Unity 4 and KSP.   After importing PartTools 0.23, I would add a Component to the GameObject.

The new KSP 1.1.2 PartTools package does not have a component to add as it did in PartTools 0.23

So, given that I imported the PartTools 1.1.2 unity package, what component (or whatever) do I need to add to my GameObject?

I answered this via PM. You still need to copy the Legacy Parttools folder into your Unity project folder.

 

 

Edited May 7, 2016 by JPLRepo
I posted here and PMed you.  Thank you for your response.
